message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I rejected your offer because it wasn't fair. Let's split it evenly.
A little more for me is reasonable, don't you think?
This is my final offer. It's a good deal, take it or leave it.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it
I meant what I said. This is my final offer. We are running out of time, and I'd rather get nothing than be taken advantage of.
